content: - For those wanting to know more about allied nations' contribution to the war in Afghanistan, this may be of interest. ++http://www.stuff.co.nz/national/2345400/US-asks-for-SAS-to-be-sent-to-Afghanistan Like their Brit and Australian cousins, the NZ SAS is highly regarded by allies. More reading: ++http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NZ_SAS ++http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Willie_Apiata -

title: US requests NZ SAS return to Afghanistan

content: ANZAC_Biscuit, You do realize that we do have an entire forum section dedicated to such topics? British and Commonwealth Militaries' forum section of military.com The posters with relevant experience may not respond as much as often as here, but they do respond when the topics interest them. And here are a couple of topics there that may interest you: "RAN unveils new AUSCAM uniform" thread of military.com "HMNZS Canterbury: Flawed MRV deal?" thread of military.com "NZ SAS?" thread of military.com

Also, in this instance, I'm interested in sharing our exploits with our American friends. It's good to know when friendly nations send their best to help out, ya know? -
